member.name: T:Testings.SearchEngineTests
member.summary: Test class for testing the search engine.

member.name: M:Testings.SearchEngineTests.GenerateName(System.Int32)
member.summary: Random name generator, used to generate random artist names and titles.

member.name: M:Testings.SearchEngineTests.FindByExistingArtist
member.summary: Test if finding by an artist name returns the media item. This is a exact match test.

member.name: M:Testings.SearchEngineTests.FindByNonExistingArtist
member.summary: Test if finding by an artist name that does not exists returns nothing. This is a exact match test.

member.name: M:Testings.SearchEngineTests.FindByExistingArtistTrimed
member.summary: Test if finding by an artist name returns the media item. This is a partial name match find.

member.name: M:Testings.SearchEngineTests.FindByExistingTitle
member.summary: Test if finding by an title returns the media item. This is a exact match test.

member.name: M:Testings.SearchEngineTests.FindByNonExistingTitle
member.summary: Test if finding by an title that does not exists returns nothing. This is a exact match test.

member.name: M:Testings.SearchEngineTests.FindByExistingTitleTrimed
member.summary: Test if finding by an title returns the media item. This is a partial name match find.

member.name: M:Testings.SearchEngineTests.FindByExistingArtistAndTitle
member.summary: Test if combining multiple rules existing artist and title (same media item) returns the media item. This is a exact match test.

member.name: M:Testings.SearchEngineTests.FindByExistingArtistAndTitleTrimed
member.summary: Test if combining multiple rules existing artist and title (same media item) partial names returns the media item. This is a partial name match find.
